content: **crocheted star in drops paris theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-738 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- size measurements approx 9 cm = 3 1/2 in diameter **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g color 38 raspberry 50 g color 07 heather 50 g color 37 rusty red 1 star weighs approx 5 g crochet gauge 18 double crochets in width and 10 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 **crochet hook ** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm = us e/4 the hook size is only a guide if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
